title: Creature Lake (2015)
overview: Five friends embark on a camping trip to sacred Native territory and are warned to stay away. When they choose to ignore the warning they are confronted with strange occurrences, seductive apparitions, vengeful locals and a deadly behemoth. Their weekend of fun becomes a descent into hell.
storyline: Five friends, up north for three days, one creature ... NO CHANCE !
synopsis: A found footage feature film -- GITASKOG:\The film for this lost footage was found when an excavation for a subdivision began in the northern former First Nation Reserve. A cache of cameras was unearthed and it was determined that the footage was 10 years old. The footage that could be recovered was reassembled in chronological order.Five friends embark on a camping trip to sacred Native territory and are warned to stay away. When they choose to ignore the warning they are confronted with strange occurrences, seductive apparitions, vengeful locals and a deadly behemoth. Their weekend of fun becomes a descent into hell.
